mapper.select: SELECT categoryNo, pcategoryNo, categoryName from category WHERE pcategoryNo is null
SELECT categoryNo,categoryName from category order by categoryNo
SELECT keywordNo, keywordName, memberNo from keyword
select categoryNo, categoryName from category where MOD(categoryNo,100) = 0
select categoryNo, categoryName from category where MOD(categoryNo,100) != 0 and categoryNo < (round(#{categoryNo},-2)+ 99) and categoryNo > (round(#{categoryNo},-2)-1)
select categoryNo, categoryName from category where MOD(categoryNo,100) != 0
select title, categoryNo from news where categoryNo = #{categoryNo}

choose.when: select distinct title from news where title like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord}) ||'%'
select distinct keywordName from keyword where keywordName like '%'|| lower(#{searchWord}) ||'%'

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO searchHistory(searchNo, memberNo, searchName, categoryNo, searchnowDate) VALUES(search_seq.NEXTVAL,#{memberNo}, #{searchName}, #{categoryNo}, SYSDATE)
